body: 這畫風再配上這劇情，真的帶勁
So we have got a perfect love, hate triangle. Well the guy seems to not hate anyone.

The two black haired are childhood friends. Light haired girl became friends with them in middle school. Black haired girl loves the light haired girl, thus hates the guy. She fucks him to connect with the girl. Light haired girl loves the guy, who loves black haired girl. This she hates the black haired girl. The guy turned down her confession but on her insistence agreed to pretend date until black haired girl falls in love with him. But those two have never had sex. In the end guy tells the childhood friend the truth and attempts to confess which she stops.
全員屆不到 什麼胃痛番
